analysis.description:
Reentrancy in zombieCreator.createRandomZombie_FreeZombie (/unique_chucks/29/0xe72fcb1215a5c677739af80f102c5d7430b5fadb.sol#197-225):
	External calls:
	- c.createZombie(star,dna,uint16(roletype),true,msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/29/0xe72fcb1215a5c677739af80f102c5d7430b5fadb.sol#218-219)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- FreeZombieCount (/unique_chucks/29/0xe72fcb1215a5c677739af80f102c5d7430b5fadb.sol#221-222)
	- isGetFreeZombie (/unique_chucks/29/0xe72fcb1215a5c677739af80f102c5d7430b5fadb.sol#219-221)

zombieCreator.withdrawZOB (/unique_chucks/29/0xe72fcb1215a5c677739af80f102c5d7430b5fadb.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-t.transfer(msg.sender,_zob) (/unique_chucks/29/0xe72fcb1215a5c677739af80f102c5d7430b5fadb.sol)

zombieCreator.createRandomZombie_ZOB_smallpack has external calls inside a loop:
	- c.createZombie(uint8(star),dna,uint16(roletype),false,msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/29/0xe72fcb1215a5c677739af80f102c5d7430b5fadb.sol#158-160)

zombieCreator.createRandomZombie_ZOB_goldpack has external calls inside a loop:

zombieCreator.createRandomZombie_Ether has external calls inside a loop:
